website_summaries.verdict: A standard-sized ball many teams use for play and practice.
pros: Just like the ones many teams use to practice
cons: Ball can be damaged by leaving it in the water for long periods, so be sure to take it out when you're done

customer_reviews.title: Mikasa water polo ball A+
customer_reviews.text: Picked this up for my son who plays on the high school team. He said he is happy with it and is built well. The ball came deflated and without a box. No big deal, just be sure to have a pump handy.
customer_reviews.author: Big Ron

customer_reviews.title: Great, it is flat... again
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this ball, as well as the #4 (for my daughter). This ball came with little to know air in it, unlike the #4. Now I know why, it has a hole somewhere in the ball. It went flat about 1-2 weeks after airing it up. I will continue to air it up, at least it can hold air for 1-2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: A. Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Received a defective ball
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a water polo ball for my son since high school season is about to begin. From the moment we pumped air into it, the ball does not remain firm. Come to find out the ball had a pinhole in. There were no options for exchange or return so hopefully, after my review, I will hear from the company we bought it from.
customer_reviews.author: Adrianna Perez

customer_reviews.title: My precious!
customer_reviews.text: There she was waiting for me in the pool.... delivered by drone goodness.... hard and firm like a good ball should be! I picked her up and threw her as hard as I could. She skipped like a champ! Great ball, great product, go get yourself one of these amazing yellow things:)
customer_reviews.author: Scott Kennelly

customer_reviews.title: Good ball - good feel in the water
customer_reviews.text: I played water polo half a century ago in high school. Now I water walk. I bought the ball so that I could handle it while I walked the shallow end of the pool. It has a good grip when wet.
customer_reviews.author: maddogdad

customer_reviews.title: Legit
customer_reviews.text: Ball is as advertised. Ready for the pool and shaming the goalie.
customer_reviews.author: spinteractive

customer_reviews.title: Mikasa Always
customer_reviews.text: 2 water polo players=years of Mikasa balls in my house. No complaints. Still their preference.
customer_reviews.author: Linetta J. Harris

customer_reviews.text: This is a good ball and fun to play with. I'm glad I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Kratz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent water polo ball
customer_reviews.text: Excellent water polo ball. My son started playing water polo in HS and the team moms told me to purchase a ball so he could get familiar with the grip and the feel. That was the best advice.
customer_reviews.author: Lalaure

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING Quality.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome ball! I ordered this ball because I joined the Water Polo team and ever since I've been in it, this ball has been amazing! The grip on the ball is well and firm and shipping was reasonable. Awesome product! One negative thing about this is the misleading size. This is more like a 4.5 rather than a size 5.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen L.

customer_reviews.title: Nice ball :-)
customer_reviews.text: Excellent ball. Nothing more to say. Professional all the way
customer_reviews.author: J. Sipiceanu

customer_reviews.title: Defective, leaky valve.
customer_reviews.text: Valve leaks, ball goes flat in an hour. Defective product.
customer_reviews.author: E. Buchholz

customer_reviews.title: Troops Love It.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for a family member in the armed forces in a foreign duty station. No matter. Shipping was on time. More importantly, the water polo players prefer the Mikasa.
customer_reviews.author: boxcar006

customer_reviews.title: Valve is leaking. Poor product's QA.
customer_reviews.text: Inflated the ball and next day was deflated due to a leaking valve.
customer_reviews.author: BrKnaRRoW

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I played water polo in high school and this was exactly like the one that we used!
customer_reviews.author: Mohammad Dahdul

customer_reviews.title: Great ball but I don't understand why I can see ...
customer_reviews.text: Great ball but I don't understand why I can see wear the two half of the ball were join together
customer_reviews.author: Pedro R.

customer_reviews.title: Great Price and Product!
customer_reviews.text: Great price and quality!!!! My boys love the ball. Just like the competition polo balls they use in their polo leagues.
customer_reviews.author: Rolando Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this ball, he plays with it everyday!
customer_reviews.author: Yuvi Takhar

customer_reviews.title: After one month, it Already has a leak
customer_reviews.text: After one month and only three uses, it already has a leak, and it’s beyond the return date. We have to pump it up each time we use it. It was good before the leak.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea M

customer_reviews.title: Perfect ball that brings back a lot of good memories!!
customer_reviews.text: The ball it is in perfect conditions and it’s the right size.
customer_reviews.author: R. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Great WP Balls!
customer_reviews.text: My son has been playing Water Polo since he was in 8th grade. He played all through High School and continues to play in college in Oregon. We have a swimming pool at our home in Southern California and he always has a WP ball in his hands when in the pool. This is his ball of choice, so Santa brings him a new one almost every year!
customer_reviews.author: Christie

customer_reviews.title: Does not hold air
customer_reviews.text: It arrived half full of air and surprisingly does not hold air. Definitely has a leak.
customer_reviews.author: it's me

customer_reviews.title: Throwback to the Glory Days
customer_reviews.text: As a competition swimmer and HS water polo player these balls were always around at the public pool. I've had a pool for several years now and I assumed a ball like this would cost a lot more. Glad to find that I can own a nostalgic piece of the past for a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Lost Weekend

customer_reviews.title: Mikasa
customer_reviews.text: My stupid original yellow mikasa. A classic I will never forget. Fell in love with Gerrianne but we both knew it wouldn't work out. We would have died together and have a purposeless live.
customer_reviews.author: Lon Sugihara

customer_reviews.title: The grand kids and I are having a ball
customer_reviews.text: The grandchildren are young but they are avid swimmers and I love being able to toss around a water polo ball with them. I still have to try to get an advantage so as long as my hand is larger than theirs we will have a ball.
customer_reviews.author: M. Slee

customer_reviews.title: Floats in water
customer_reviews.text: This balls holds air well and hasn't lost its grippiness in the few months I 've been throwing it around.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Mosher

customer_reviews.title: Good ball, good price
customer_reviews.text: My son just got into his high school's water polo team and wanted the same one they use so he can practice throwing and catching. It looked like a volley ball but it's actually a LOT grippier.
customer_reviews.author: Glen Sha

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Mikasa for years has always been the standard in Water Polo balls.
customer_reviews.author: Muglborn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This Product was absolutely amazing our students had such a great time playing with it. We we as ruff as you can be with a ball. Thank you for shipping it to me so quickly.
customer_reviews.author: jnfajardo27

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought 5 water polo balls to decorate and present to the senior water polo players at my son's college. I was afraid I would have to have them pumped up, but they came to me already inflated and ready to decorate! PERFECT!
customer_reviews.author: Polomom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great ball for my son to practice with at home.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great ball!
customer_reviews.text: Just like I remember....former water polo player....got this to play around with at the pool with my son. Nice grip. Solid choice.
customer_reviews.author: cleedenver

customer_reviews.title: aquatic polo anyone
customer_reviews.text: good ball for waterpolo. . .now if i can only train my horse to swim. . .
customer_reviews.author: stl griller

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a practice ball for my son. This is just like the ones they use in his High School team, so he loves it. Great product, great price, fast shipping!
customer_reviews.author: David in Lansing MI

customer_reviews.title: Loved the Water Polo Ball
customer_reviews.text: It was perfect. My son loved it for Christmas. He said it is just the one he wanted. Thank you for your help.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Nice Grip
customer_reviews.text: Love the texture of the outside of the ball. Makes gripping easier. My daughter takes water polo and some of the balls are so smooth they slip right out of your hand.
customer_reviews.author: Cari

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for my son to use at home to practice ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my son to use at home to practice ball handling skills. This is the same ball used by his team for practice and games.
customer_reviews.author: Pacer Ace

customer_reviews.title: Misleading Title
customer_reviews.text: Like all Mikasa balls, it's a great ball. However, it's slightly smaller than a normal college sized ball.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: We practice in our pool and his skills have gotten better. Definitely a quality ball and no different than ...
customer_reviews.text: My son started playing HS water polo. We practice in our pool and his skills have gotten better. Definitely a quality ball and no different than the ones they use during his games.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: OK but requires some care
customer_reviews.text: if you are buying this ball and think you might leave it in the pool for a while --- don't. It doesn't wear the weather and water very well for long periods. Mine also became lop-sided and always sat in the water the same way; and showed the wear on one side because of it. If you are good about taking the ball out of the water when finished then it's a good ball I'm sure.
customer_reviews.author: Garland

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This is a great water polo ball. Bought it for the backyard pool as a practice ball. Mikasa is the only brand I will buy. They hold up really well. My son has played water polo for 6 years. This brand is all they have ever used. Keep it indoors when it's not being used and don't leave it in the pool or outside overnight. Also, no bouncing on the ground--it ruins the grip. These few tips will keep this ball in great shape for several summers.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Play some polo!
customer_reviews.text: Great ball, but expect to have to blow it up.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Mikasa WP
customer_reviews.text: We bought it for our son to practice WP. Good grip and quality . Arrived on time .
customer_reviews.author: habibsadeghi

customer_reviews.title: Super!
customer_reviews.text: My son and his swim team friends love this water polo ball a lot, they use it before practice and now want to start a team!
customer_reviews.author: dht

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I ordered. I needed a standard ball and this was perfect for my needs. I use it every day in the pool
customer_reviews.author: CD.28

customer_reviews.title: Mikasa Competition Men's Water Polo Ball
customer_reviews.text: we spent an hour in store to find the water polo ball but it too expensive. So we went home and got the good one. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Good product, bad shipping
customer_reviews.text: The ball is great, just what I am used to. The problem is that it is shipped inflated, which firstly seems a waste of space to me when it could use a box a fraction of the size, and also the fact that it isn't completely inflated (probably due to pressure changes during shipping) - so you still have to pump it up anyway! This may seem like making a mountain out of a mole hill, but when you have to put the bloody thing in your luggage to fly with and have no way of deflating it, it is somewhat more annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Elusival

customer_reviews.title: Great ball
customer_reviews.text: I played water polo in my youth, so it feels great to have a proper ball in my hands again. Good grip, good quality-Mikasa is the one.
customer_reviews.author: Florian Weller

customer_reviews.title: defective
customer_reviews.text: after initially pumping it up and working well, the next day i found the ball was flat again. the ball has a slow leak
customer_reviews.author: nicholas berg

customer_reviews.title: little bit disappointed that it's not made anymore in JAPAN
customer_reviews.text: ok ball....... little bit disappointed that it's not made anymore in JAPAN..... shame, that they moving business to countries like "China".....different- crappy quality........ different materials.....not really satisfied. MIKASA balls made in Japan was the THING - this one is like "fake"-crappy version...
customer_reviews.author: sergei kobets

customer_reviews.title: The Devil’s in The Detail!
customer_reviews.text: I give it a single star because, I live in Thailand, I looked everywhere for a water polo ball in Thailand but couldn’t find a single one high or low. I bit the bullet and ordered one ex good ole USA and much to my chagrin when my purchase arrives, (the postage was almost the same price as the ball,) there is stencilling on the ball (FT3R Thailand MIKASASPORTS.COM) which leads me to believe it was in all likelihood manufactured in Thailand!?
customer_reviews.author: Russell Vik

product_meta.title: W5000 - Mikasa Sports Competition Men's Water Polo Ball
product_meta.description: Men's Size 5 Mikala Water Polo Ball. USA Water Polo approved. NFHS Stamped. Buffed for maximum grip

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
